SongRequest.title: SongRequest
SongRequest.description: Represents a song request submitted by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the song request.

studentId.description: Reference to the Participant who submitted the request.

participantName.description: Denormalized name of the participant for easy display.

karaokeUrl.description: URL to the karaoke video for the song.

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the song request was submitted (server timestamp).

order.description: The order of the song in the queue.

Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description: Represents a participant or admin who can submit song requests.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

disabled.description: If true, the user account is suspended and has no access.

AuditLog.title: AuditLog
AuditLog.description: Represents a log of an action taken in the system.

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores participant and admin profiles. Each document represents a user.

/song_requests/{songRequestId}.description: Stores all song requests in a single collection for easier querying and sorting by admins/owners.

/audit_logs/{logId}.description: Stores a chronological log of all significant actions taken in the application.
